name: AKU Anak Siap Siaga Hadapi Gempa
name_original: AKU Anak Siap Siaga Hadapi Gempa
description: AKU- Anak Siap Siaga Hadapi Gempa will following Abang and Adek to do things we should do when we earthquake warning, where to hide when the earthquake occurs and what to do to survive after the disaster happens.
